title: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy
description: John Le Carré's internationally famous hero, British Secret Service Agent George Smiley, has a world-class problem. He has discovered a mole --- a Soviet double agent who has managed to burrow his way up to the highest level of British Intelligence. Under the direction of Karla, Smiley's equivelent in the Soviet Union, the agent has already blown some of the most vital secret operations and most productive networks. Now --- how can Smiley use a lifetime's worth of espionage skills to ferret out a spy who posseses them as well? This is an alternate cover edition for ISBN 0743457900.
author: John Le Carré
